name: Speed Demon (GuilloryCraft)
description:
You were summoned to retrieve Time Crystals from the depths of hell. Each one you bring to you summoning circle will give a stacking 2x multiplier to all sources of points, but also makes everything faster. Switch between your four weapons to kill everything in your way.

Programming by: GuilloryCraft (me)

Sound Design by: John R. Willow https://soundcloud.com/user-443610744

Art by: real-live-human on tumbr
